description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower, Kale & Bacon Mac Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mac & cheese,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Seafood free,Kale,Low sugar,Cauliflower
name: Cauliflower, Kale & Bacon Mac Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C. Grease a 12-cup ovenproof baking dish.
Par-cook macaroni in boiling salted water for 8 minutes. Add kale and cook for 1 minute or until it begins to wilt. Drain well and transfer to prepared baking dish.

Meanwhile, combine cauliflower and milk in a medium saucepan. Simmer gently over medium-low heat for 6 minutes or until cauliflower is just soft. Transfer cauliflower and milk to a blender and purée until smooth. Stir in nutmeg and season with salt and pepper. Pour cauliflower sauce over pasta mixture in baking dish and toss with half of the cheese.
Crumble bread into coarse breadcrumbs. Add bacon and remaining cheese. Sprinkle over pasta mixture. Spray with oil. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden brown and bubbling around the edges.
